name: MEC Skylight UPF Long Sleeve T-Shirt - Infants
description:
Cover up your little one during sunny hikes and sandcastle sessions. With its 40 UPF rating the Skylight long sleeve protects sensitive skin, while wicking away moisture to keep your little beach bum cool.Slim fit keeps material to a minimum, allowing complete freedom.Active odour control lets you go a couple extra days between washes.UPF 40 blocks more than 97% of UV, great for long days in the sun.bluesign® approved poly spandex blend dries fast, wicks moisture and feels cool against the skin.Name label on the inside helps make the games of ‘whose is whose’ a bit easier.Flatlock seams are non-chafing.

        Sustainability






.bluesign-cls-1,.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{fill:none;}.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{stroke:#333;stroke-width:1.79px;}.bluesign-cls-2{stroke-linejoin:round;}.bluesign-cls-3{stroke-miterlimit:10;}
